entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h overnight. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 18 this evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Wednesday 01 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 7.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 in the afternoon. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 25 in the morning and minus 17 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Wednesday 01 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Clearing in the evening. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 near midnight. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 17 in the evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Wednesday 01 March 2023
